candidates.title: Update version to 1.1.0 and chainspec.toml for upgrade.
candidates.body: Era 359 is around 2021-04-30T13:00:00Z and expected activation time for casper network.

candidates.title: EE-1224: Remove transfer stored contracts
candidates.body:
Ref: https://casperlabs.atlassian.net/browse/EE-1224

This PR removes stored transfer contracts whose functionality is replaced with wasmless transfer contracts.

candidates.title: NDRS-1117: Backport handshake
candidates.body:
This backports two 1.1.0 changes to `dev`, with the necessary alterations: https://github.com/CasperLabs/casper-node/pull/1256 (making the maximum message size depend on the chainspec instead of being hardcoded) https://github.com/CasperLabs/casper-node/pull/1263 (include the chainspec version in the handshake)

It also introduces the first set of rountrip tests that are ensuring we can serialize/deserialize network messages from 1.0.0 and onwards.

candidates.title: Updating Genesis files and Config for 1_0_1 protocol
candidates.body:
Changed config.tar.gz to only include accounts.toml for 1_0_0.
Updated known_addresses in config.toml to current validator set.
Set protocol and versions to 1.0.1 and activation point to 140.

candidates.title: NO-TICKET: Include chainspec version in handshake
candidates.body:
This introduces a protocol version field into the handshake, which is ignored by the V1.0.0 node. At the same time, if absent, V1.0.0 is filled in. As a result, every version of the release node software has a correct protocol version field.

~~**NOTE** This PR is due a rebase & force push once https://github.com/CasperLabs/casper-node/pull/1256 is merged to master.~~

candidates.title: EE-1205: add storage::delete to contract API
candidates.body:
This PR:
* introduces a `storage::delete` function to the contract API
* introduces similar `RuntimeContext::delete` and `TrackingCopy::delete` methods to support this function

candidates.title: NO-TICKET: merge master to dev
candidates.body:
This PR merges current `master` into current `dev`.

The [fourth last commit](https://github.com/CasperLabs/casper-node/commit/48ca022fd0085d09f6b61134c3b72c9de7076929) is the actual merge and is probably the only one worth reviewing.

candidates.title: NDRS-970: Remove semver crate and use ProtocolVersion
candidates.body:
REF: https://casperlabs.atlassian.net/browse/NDRS-970

CHANGELOG:

- Removed `semver` crate from `node`, `client` and `ci` dependencies
- Replaced usages of the crate with the `casper-types::ProtocolVersion` instead.
- Added a new `FromStr` impl for `ProtocolVersion` to help with refactoring
- Refactored code to use `ProtocolVersion`

candidates.title: Merge master back into to dev post 0.9.3
